global.webview_connection_error: Unable to connect with the API. (Error: 101)
global.substrate_connection_error: Unable to connect with the API. (Error: 104)

delete_wallet_confirmation.title: Remove Wallet?
delete_wallet_confirmation.message: This can’t be undone. You’ll lose all accounts and tokens associated with this wallet if you did not back up.

backup_wallet_confirmation.title: Backup Wallet
backup_wallet_confirmation.message: We highly recommend that you create a back-up file of your wallet before deleting it.

export_account.title: Create a password
export_account.description: This will be used when you import your account to a new device

import_wallet.title: Import wallet
import_wallet.description: If you backed up your wallet previously, you can upload the file to import your wallet.
import_wallet.invalid_file: Invalid backup file, please try again

setup_passcode.title: Setup Passcode
setup_passcode.description: Add a passcode to keep your wallet safe

account_setup.title: Account Name
account_setup.description: This will be used just for easy reference

create_account_backup.title: Back up your account
create_account_backup.description: In the next step you will see an account recovery phrase. This phrase is the only way you can recover access to your account if your phone is lost or stolen.
create_account_backup.agreement: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my account

account_advanced_options.keypair_type_tip: Determines what cryptography will be used to create this account. Note that to validate on Polkadot, the session account must use "ed25519".
account_advanced_options.secret_derivation_path_tip: You can set a custom derivation path for this account using the following syntax "/<soft-key>//<hard-key>". The "/<soft-key>" and "//<hard-key>" may be repeated and mixed. An optional "///<password>" can be used with a mnemonic seed, and may only be specified once.
account_advanced_options.invalid_secret_uri: Unable to match provided value to a secret URI.

account_recovery_phrase.title: Account recovery phrase
account_recovery_phrase.description: Write this down or copy these words in the right order and save them somewhere safe. Do not share it to anyone

import_account.title: Account name
import_account.existing_account: This accounts already exists in the wallet

import_account_from_mnemonic.title: Account recovery phrase
import_account_from_mnemonic.description: This is the 12 word phrase you were given when you created your account.

verify_recovery_phrase.title: Verify recovery phrase
verify_recovery_phrase.description: Verify that you wrote down the 12 words correctly

account_list.title: Accounts
account_list.empty_accounts: You don’t have any accounts yet

account_details.backup_details: This phrase allows you to recover your account if your phone is lost or you change your device.
account_details.export_account_description: Scan this QR code in your new device

create_password.include_proper_case: Must include uppercase and lowercase letters

send_token.title: Send to
send_token.same_address: You can't send tokens to the same address
send_token.amount_minus_fees_msg: Amount updated to maximum available minus fees

transaction_failed.title: Transaction failed
transaction_failed.description: View your transaction and try again.
transaction_failed.network_error: Transaction failed due to network failure
transaction_failed.insufficient_fund_error: Transaction failed due to insufficient fund for network fees
